content.title: You can always feel product/market fit when it's happening
content.author: Marc Andreessen

generation.prompt: Franz Kline style bold gestural abstraction with confident black brushstrokes creating dynamic movement, high contrast between black marks and white space, gestural energy captured in sweeping brush movements, minimal color palette emphasizing form and gesture over representation.
